Name: Lyran Guards
Details: The Lyran Guards were the second Lyran brigade mustered after the formation of the Lyran Commonwealth.  Since their founding, the regiments of this brigade have fought in nearly every offensive or defensive engagement and secured many victories.  Unlike the Arcturan Guards, the Lyran Guards recruited its soldiers from across the Commonwealth, and, second only to the Royal Guards, is the most prestigious commission in the Lyran Alliance Armed Forces.
